actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.

committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: A bill to provide for a 10 per centum reduction in congressional salaries whenever the budget is not balanced.

summary.text: Reduces Congressional salaries by ten percent, beginning with the fiscal year which ends September 30, 1981, if the budget for the preceding year was not balanced.

titles.title: A bill to provide for a 10 per centum reduction in congressional salaries whenever the budget is not balanced.
